item.title: Hexo
item.description: 关于Hexo的使用 start start.sh (~/note/myblog/start.sh) #!/bin/bash hexo s -i 192.168.0.99 -p 5000 _config.yml main _config.yml filename: _config.yml 13 # URL 14 ## If your site is put in a subdirectory, set url as 'http://yoursite.com/child' and root as '/child/' 15 url: http://192.168.0.99:5000 16 root: / 17 permalink: :year/:month/:day/:title/ 18 permalink_defaults: freemind theme’ bug bug for search I have to add a string.trim () in
